Translations.Text: arau niscaya mora sastiye'i haiche yantranadayaka sasti
arau tumi sihamtaka jana'i diya, ibraahimara atithisakalara katha
yetiya te'omloke te'omra ocarata upasthita hai ka’le, ‘chalama’, tetiya te'om ka’le, ‘niscaya ami aponalokara bisaye sankita’
Te'omloke ka’le, ‘bhaya nakiraba, ami aponaka ejana jnani putrara susambada dibalaihe ahicho’
Te'om ka’le, ‘bard'dhakya'i sparsa karaa satbe'o aponaloke moka (santana labhara) susambada diche? Eteke aponaloke kihara (kenekai) susambada di ache’
te'omloke ka’le, ‘ami satya susambada dicho; eteke apuni niraasa naha’ba’
Te'om ka’le, ‘pathabhrastasakalara bahirae nija pratipalakara rahamatara paraa koneno niraasa haya’
te'om ka’le, ‘he praeraita (phiraista)sakala! Aponalokara arau kiba bisesa uddesya ache neki’
te'omloke ka’le, ‘niscaya amaka eta aparaadhi sampradayara ocaralai praerana karaa haiche
kintu lutara paraiyalara biraud'dhe nahaya, niscaya ami te'omloka ata'ike raksa karaima
kerala te'omra straira bahirae; ami sid'dhanta laicho ye, niscaya ta'i pichata arasthanakarai sakalara antarbhukta’
Tara pichata phiraistasakala yetiya luta paraiyalara ocarata ahila
tetiya lute ka’le, ‘aponaloka dekhona aparaicita’
Te'omloke ka’le, ‘nahaya, baram ami aponara ocaralai se'itorae lai ahicho yi bisaye sihamte sandeha posana karaichila’
‘arau ami aponara ocarata satya sambada lai ahicho arau niscaya ami satyabadi’

‘eteke apuni raatira kono eta bhagata aponara paraiyalabargaka lai ola'i ya'omka, arau apuni sihamtara piche piche gai thakiba. Aponalokara konorae'i yate pichalai ghurai nacaya; aponalokaka ya’laike yoraara adesa karaa haiche talaike guci ya'omka’
Arau ami te'omka e'i bisaye phayacala jana'i dilo ye, niscaya sihamtaka usara lage lage samuli binasa karaa ha’ba
Arau nagarabasi ullasita hai upasthita ha’la
Te'om ka’le, ‘niscaya e'omloka mora atithi; eteke tomaloke moka apamana nakaraiba’
‘Tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau moka lanchita nakaraiba’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘ami prthiraira (yi si) lokaka asraya dibalai tomaka nisedha karaa nachilo ne’
lute ka’le, ‘yadi tomaloke kiba karaiba'i bicaraa tente mora e'i choraalibora ache (bibahara madhyamata baidha upaye karaa)’
Tomara jiranara sapata! Niscaya sihamta te'omlokara nicata mataliya hai ghurai achila
Phalata suryodayara samayata pracanda cinamrae sihamtaka ahi dharaile
Tara pichata ami janapadaka olota'i tala-opara karai dilo arau sihamtara oparata poraa matira sila barsana karailo
Niscaya iyata nidarsana ache paryabeksana-sakti sampanna byaktisakalara babe
Arau niscaya seya manuhara calacala pathara kasate'i bidyamana
Niscaya iyata muminasakalara babe ache nidarsana
Arau a'ikaha basisakale'o achila simalanghanakarai
se'i karane ami sihamtara paraa'o pratisodha laicho, arau duyota janapada prakasya pathara damtite arasthita
Arau arasye hijarabasiye raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila
ami sihamtaka amara nidarsana pradana karaichilo, kintu sihamte seya upeksa karaichila
Arau sihamte niraapade pahara kati ghara nirmana karaiba paraichila
Tathapi'o puraara bhagata pracanda sabda'i sihamtaka ahi dharaile
Eteke sihamte yi arjana karaichila seya sihamtara kono kamata aha nachila

Akasasamuha arau prthirai lagate e'i duyora majara kono basturae'i ami yatharthatara bahirae srsti karaa na'i, arau niscaya kiyamata ahiba. Eteke tumi parama saujan'yara saite sihamtaka ksama karai diya
Niscaya tomara raba, teraemi mahasrasta, mahajnani
Arau ami tomaka pradana karaicho punah punah pathita satota ayata arau maha kora'ana

Ami sihamtara bibhinna sraenika bhoga-bilasara yi upakarana dicho tara prati tumi ketiya'o tomara ducaku prasaraita nakaraiba. Sihamtara babe tumi dukha nakaraiba; arau tumi muminasakalara babe tomara bahu nata karaa (arthat sadaya horaa)
arau koraa, ‘niscaya ma'i prakasya satarkakarai’
Yidarae ami aratirna karaichilo bibhaktakarai sakalara oparata
yisakale kora'anaka bibhinnabharae bibhakta karaiche
Eteke tomara pratipalakara sapata! Niscaya ami sihamta sakaloke jeraa karaima
se'i bisaye, yito sihamte amala karaichila
Eteke tumi yi bisaye adesapraapta haicha seya prakasyabharae pracara karaa arau musbaraikasakalara paraa mukha ghuraa'i loraa
Niscaya bidraupakaraisakalara biraud'dhe amiye'i tomara babe yathesta
yisakale allahara lagata ana kono upasya nirdharana karae. Niscaya atisighrae'i (iyara parainama) sihamte janiba paraiba
Arau arasye ami e'i katha jano ye, sihamtara kathata tomara mana sankucita haya
eteke tumi tomara pratipalakara tachabiha patha karaa arau chajadahakarai sakalara antarbhukta horaa
Arau tomara mrtyu naha laike tumi tomara pratipalakara ibadata karaa
